casebody.data:
No. 09-11529. Julio Eliezer Ortiz, Sr., Petitioner v. Jeffrey A. Beard, Secretary, Pennsylvania Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1125, 131 S. Ct. 852,

178 L. Ed. 2d 582,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9598. December 13, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 886, 131 S. Ct. 216, 178 L. Ed. 2d 130, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 7013.
